name: The Block Pro
title: Rapid Insights The Azuki Airdrop
text:
Synopsis
Azuki launched its ANME token airdrop on Arbitrum One, strategically choosing an alternative blockchain to Ethereum to mitigate high transaction costs and low throughput.

Key Insights
- Azuki officially launched its ANME token airdrop on January 23, 2025
- The token is Ethereum-native but was airdropped on Arbitrum One blockchain
- Reason for choosing Arbitrum: Ethereum's lower throughput and higher transaction costs
- The newsletter also includes a comprehensive weekly economic calendar with key financial events, including:
  - FOMC interest-rate decision on Wednesday, January 29th
  - Fed Chair Powell press conference on the same day
  - Multiple economic indicators to be released, such as GDP, home sales, consumer confidence, and personal income
- The economic calendar suggests potential market-moving events across various financial sectors
